div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1135 Sabun Hill, near Cherronesus (near mod. Sevastopol'), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1971 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 61+ AE. Pot hoard Cherronesus: AE (as BMC 6, 7-8; Zograph, pl. 35, 16, 23) Disposition: Sevastopol' Information from A. M. Gilevich
